pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dex is a library supporting "Deferred Execution" with the explicit goal of integrating with GNOME and GTK-based applications. It provides primatives for supporting futures in a variety of ways with both read-only and writable views. Additionally, integration with existing asynchronous-based APIs is provided through the use of wrapper promises.
